thread.title: B4 Consulting and InEight Announce Agreement at InEight Experience
thread.title_full: B4 Consulting and InEight Announce Agreement at InEight Experience

author: Jackie Thrasivoulos
title: B4 Consulting and InEight Announce Agreement at InEight Experience
text:
B4 Consulting ®, helping companies grow with innovative software, services and support, today announced that it has signed a strategic agreement with InEight Inc. (InEight) in which B4 Consulting will support InEight construction industry solutions as a Value Added Reseller and serve as a strategic Systems Integrator for InEight in the construction industry. The announcement was made at the 2015 InEight Experience (Fairmount Scottsdale Princess; Oct. 11-14), a networking and knowledge-sharing event for the construction industry. At the event, B4 Consulting and InEight will highlight emerging solutions for visual project procurement based on InEight InfinyD. “The synergy from this agreement will enable us to to quicken the pace of developing innovative technology solutions for the engineering and construction industry, while ensuring expert implementation of these solutions and the best-in-class SAP solutions, which both B4 and InEight bring to market,” said Bill Ponseti, CEO of InEight.
“The InEight and B4 Consulting agreement strengthens our business model but more importantly further strengthens the solutions we provide to the construction industry,” noted Klaus Schottenhamel, president and CEO of B4 Consulting. “Moreover, we are pleased to be designated as a strategic SI and our consulting and professional services teams are eager to support InEight projects.”
About B4 Consulting, Inc.
B4 Consulting integrates business processes and technologies globally for customers who want to transform their businesses with innovative solutions. Our team of solution architects integrates these solutions with leading systems, such as SAP solutions, to enable business performance excellence and improved profitability. Partnering with customers throughout the U.S. and Canada, B4 Consulting has the a largest practice in North America dedicated to the engineering, construction, real estate, equipment management, field services and professional services industries. http://www.b4-consulting.com Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/b4consulting
About InEight Inc.
With applications trusted for more than 25 years, InEight combines proven software technology with a unified vision to help companies visualize, estimate, manage, control and connect all aspects of capital and maintenance projects. InEight now has more than 20,000 users in nearly 500 companies in 33 countries. The InEight solution portfolio enables project-driven companies to get the visibility and control they need to avoid surprises, increase operational efficiency and improve profitability across the project lifecycle. Based in Scottsdale, Ariz., InEight is a subsidiary of Kiewit Corporation, one of North America’s largest and most respected construction and engineering organizations. For more information, please visit ineight.com.
